3.label: LED Light
3.description: LED status when device on or off.

options.label: LED on when load is off
LED on when light is on

6.label: Dim Up/Down Rate
6.description: Adjust the speed at which the ramps to a specific value other than 0 and FF

16.label: Switch Mode
16.description: Turn your dimmer into an On/Off switch with switch mode

19.label: Alternate Exclusion
19.description: Never accidentally remove a device during with alternate exclusion

options.label: Normal operation, press any button on the device
Press two times ON button and two times OFF button, LED will flash 5 times if exclusion is successful

30.label: Minimum Dim Threshold
30.description: Set the minimum dimmer threshold when manually or remotely controlled

31.label: Maximum Brightness Threshold
31.description: Set the maximum brightness threshold when manually or remotely controlled

32.label: Default Brightness Level
32.description: Set the default brightness level that the dimmer will turn on when being controlled manually
